name: SovietJump
description:
Escape from a black hole with your hook and your jetpack. If you are wondering why is named soviet, I liked the name. It is really my first game and make it for fun, it is the best I could do in three days for the Score Space Jam. So I hope you like it.

Controlls are use A and D for move, aim your hook with the mouse, bring back your hook with E and use your Jetpack with SPACE. The objective is to get to the top of the universe.

The credits are for:

Programmer: Sebastian De La Quintana

Drawer: Mateo Salinas (He is awesome, he just literally made everything on Paint)

Music:

  Menu: ППК - Воскрешение (Robot's Outro)

  Game: https://freesound.org/people/Romariogrande/sounds/396231/

  Black Hole: https://freesound.org/people/tec_studio/sounds/232302/

Other sounds make in: Bfxr
